section.p: This template wraps relevant problems or diagnoses at the close of a visit or that need to be followed after the visit. If the encounter is associated with a Hospital Discharge, the Hospital Discharge Diagnosis must be used. This entry requires at least one Problem Observation entry.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-14895, CONF:1198-14896, CONF:1198-32542 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Encounter Diagnosis template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-19182)/@code="29308-4" Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-19183, CONF:1198-32160)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-14892, CONF:1198-14893, CONF:1198-14898)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Encounter Diagnosis template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14889, R2.1=CONF:1198-14889)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14890, R2.1=CONF:1198-14890)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-19182)/@code="29308-4" Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-19183, CONF:1198-32160)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-14892, CONF:1198-14893, CONF:1198-14898)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80"/> <code code="29308-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Diagnosis"/> <text>Text Value</text> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.113"/> <code code="75328-5" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Prognosis"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143"/> <code code="225773000" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Preference"/> <text>Text Value</text> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> </author> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5"/> <code code="11323-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Health status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6"/> <code code="33999-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entryRelationship> </act>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14895, CONF:14896 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80"
Consol Encounter Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14889, R2.1=CONF:1198-14889)
Consol Encounter Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14890, R2.1=CONF:1198-14890)
Consol Encounter Diagnosis SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14891)/@code="29308-4" Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:14897)

Consol Encounter Diagnosis SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:14892, CONF:14893, CONF:14898) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
